description: Complete AI dietary analysis implementation tasks from .kiro/specs/10-ai-dietary-analysis/tasks.md
context: Created core data models and enumerations including DietaryAnalysis, DietaryViolation, DietaryWarning classes and ComplianceLevel, ViolationType, SeverityLevel, DietaryRestrictionType enums
Created SecureConfigurationService for API key management using MAUI SecureStorage with validation and encryption
Created OpenAI service implementation with chat completion API integration, authentication, and JSON response parsing
Created Anthropic service implementation with message API integration, authentication headers, and JSON response parsing
Created Anthropic service implementation with message API integration, authentication headers, and JSON response parsing
Created RuleBasedAnalysisService with allergen, religious, and lifestyle restriction checking using keyword matching
Created main DietaryAnalysisService orchestrating AI-first approach with rule-based fallback
Created AnalysisCache model and AnalysisCacheService with SQLite storage, cache key generation, and expiration logic
Set up dependency injection registration for all AI analysis services in MauiProgram.cs
Completed core AI dietary analysis infrastructure setup with dependency injection
